description: A Node represents a customer or its subdivision in the Hub/Ecosystem.

contents.name: DisplayName
contents.description: The display name of the Node (e.g. 'Dev Node A').

contents.name: Name
contents.description: The name of the Node (aka the subdomain, e.g. dev-node-a).
contents.comment: Must be unique within the ecosystem. Maximum 30 characters

contents.name: SyncEndpointUri
contents.description: The URL for the synchronization endpoint of the Node.

contents.name: NotificationEndpointUri
contents.description: The URL for the notification endpoint of the Node.

contents.name: Verified
contents.description: An indication if the Node was verified by the coordinator of the ecosystem.

contents.name: LinkedAgents
contents.description: List of Agents linked to the Node.

contents.name: Datasets
contents.description: List of DataSets where the Node is the owner.

contents.name: Publications
contents.description: List of Invites to Publications for the Node.

contents.name: Dataflows
contents.description: List of all Dataflows of the Node.
